means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 鲍尔住所名称，来源于古英语，含义是“村舍，农舍，内室”(bower,cottage,inner room)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 鲍尔 Bow变体

sentence.Network_en: They sat under the leafy bower at the end of the garden and watched the sun set.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们坐在花园尽头由叶子搭成的凉棚下观看落日.

sentence.Network_en: Mrs. Quilp was pining in her bower.
sentence.Network_cn: 奎尔普太太正在她的闺房里度着愁苦的岁月.

sentence.Network_en: She rolls the curtain up and light comes in her bower.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1972年鲍尔（Bower）进行了对偶联合的学习实验，他要求一组被试看到对偶词时尽量形成视觉表象，而对另一组被试不给这种提示 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  būr 'dwelling, inner room', of Germanic origin; related to German Bauer 'birdcage'

entry.tran: （花园或树林中的）树阴，阴凉处
entry.def: A bower is a shady, leafy shelter in a garden or wood.

means.word_mean: 1. a framework that supports climbing plants;

sentences.sentence: "the arbor provided a shady resting place in the park"
